subject: Youth
Hispanic-Americans
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Tab Ramos is coaching the U.S. Under-20 men's team with an eye to further developing the United States as a soccer nation. Many of his young players, like Ramos himself, have Hispanic roots.
snippet: Tab Ramos is coaching the U.S. Under-20 men's team with an eye to further developing the United States as a soccer nation. Many of his young players, like Ramos himself, have Hispanic roots.
